Content.Text:
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Working again today? I hope things go
well, <PARENT>!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Working again today? I hope things go
well, <PARENT>!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> is already so big. It's great
to see my child growing up with such
energy.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> has gotten so big, and obviously
takes after you!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
How <CHILD_NAME> has grown! And so healthy. I
couldn't be happier!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm very happy to see <CHILD_NAME> doing so
well. I hope our child will continue
to grow up strong and healthy.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm surprised to see how much <CHILD_NAME>
has grown! Time really flies after you
get married, doesn't it?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> is getting big. Our very own
treasure! I'm very enthusiastic about
our child's future.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> is such a big kid already! And
will you look at that face! More and 
more like you every day, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look at <CHILD_NAME>, so big and cute! My
magic must have really worked!

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> is growing up. I know... know
nothing bad will ever happen to our
child.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so happy to see <CHILD_NAME> growing. Our
dearest treasure! I can't wait to see
what the future holds.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look at how big <CHILD_NAME> is already! I'm
brimming with happiness for our child!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can't believe <CHILD_NAME> is already this
big! Time goes by so quickly after you
get married! Don't you agree?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Daddy, Mommy, I love you！ We'll all
be together forever!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Daddy, Mommy, I love you！ We'll all
be together forever!

<CHILD_NAME> has become such an energetic
child! From now on the three of us will
be even happier together.
